title: Will i get a perma for this?

replies.body:

If you're not confident with what you're gonna say, **don't say it at all.**

If you do it enough then sure, I don't see why not also "I am not passive aggressive, I am only passive harassment (not reportable)." lmao, way to try to explain it your way. Pretty sure by that sentence alone you know you deserve something.

No, if you were to get banned for that, then people would get banned for playing proxy singed.
wtf type of logic is this?

He posts a lot of weird and wonderful things but his way of explaining it is a bit special. 

Answering his question though saying lol after should not be reportable but adding anything else has potential to get you banned.

If saying lol was bannable then riot would have delete champion emotes like laughing, displaying banners, taunts as all these could be considered showing bad sportsmanship. 

Your passive harassment behaviour though could get you that perma ban if people are reporting you. You recently came off a 2 week ban from memory so best to just say lol and leave the kids alone in chat. Better off killing them again in game then type crap to them.
gg ez is deemed banable so I figure this falls in the same category (hence my response). Not that I think it is worthy of it, just stating it likely is based off of knowledge I have read.
The way I look at it is if laughing in a game is bannable be it for something positive or negative then that game is no longer a game.
That is rather annoying and would probably be considered spam.
